channel.title: Convert to ancient mage
channel.description:
hello, can somewone help me :confused: when i click on the dark mage nothing happends i tried everything so can you help me.
my server is based on testscape.
:)plz help me :)

item.title: Convert to ancient mage
item.dc:creator: @wicked_pker wicked pker
item.description:
@wicked_pker wrote:

first add thisglobal object

makeGlobalObject(cordsx, cordsy, 6552, 0, 10);//Ancients Altar

then add this case

[code]break;

case 6552: // Ancient Altar
NpcDialogue = 0;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
animation(435, absY, absX);
RemoveAllWindows();
if (ancients == 1) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
ancients = 0;
sendMessage(“You convert to normal magicks !”);
} else {
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
ancients = 1;
sendMessage(“You convert to ancient magicks !”);
}[/code]

Read full topic
